DOC.brief_summary: The Danish Ventral Hernia Database ( DVHD ) register 37 different perioperative parameter . The aim present study use large-scale data DVHD uncover risk factor readmission , reoperation ( indication ) , death reoperation recurrence incisional hernia repair .
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Morbidity After Incisional Hernia Repairs
DOC.detailed_description: All principal incisional hernia register Danish Ventral Hernia Database include study . The included patient follow 4 year order identify correlation technical aspect hernia repair postoperative morbidity .
